## roles.Api.add() method

Adds a new role with the specified contactId to the current context and returns the role.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(request: AddRoleRequest): Promise<Role>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [AddRoleRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.roles.addrolerequest.md) | the create request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Role](./smokeball-client-sdk.roles.role.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```
const request: AddRoleRequest = {
  name: 'Client',
  contactId: 'fd540bd6-f74c-45bf-b2ab-8107d0781a83',
};
const roles = await sdk.roles.add(request);
```
